name: wool
author: Nicolas Lochet
description: Test some idea about event/log based datastorage, CQRS and fancy stuff.

scripts.start: node cli.js example/index.js -i example/data/init.json -e example/data/events.db | bunyan
scripts.watch: nodemon -V -w cli.js -w index.js -w example/ ./cli.js -- example/index.js -d -i example/data/init.json -e example/data/events.db | bunyan
scripts.autolinttest: nodemon -e js,yml -x 'npm run lint && tape test/**/*.spec.js |tap-summary --no-progress'
scripts.link-all: for u in $(ls -1d ../wool-* | sed -e 's/..\///'); do npm link $u; done
